name: pplnsdoc
tagline: 本项目用于管理pplns项目中所有文档。
body:
**Git global setup**

-------
git config --global user.name "neal.zhang"

git config --global user.email "Loong@pplns.com"

-------
**Create a new repository**

------
mkdir bitmonitor

cd bitmonitor

git init

touch README.md

git add README.md

git commit -m "first commit"

git remote add origin git@github.com:pplns/pplnsdoc.git

git push -u origin master

------
**Push an existing Git repository**

------
cd existing_git_repo

git remote add origin git@github.com:pplns/pplnsdoc.git

git push -u origin master
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
